DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Female Patient Childbearing Potential Contraception Agreement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not a patient who is a woman of childbearing potential, has agreed to use contraception.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Female Patient Childbearing Potential Contraception Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant._The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In zoology, denoting the sex that bears the young or the ovum.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Childbearing Potential Contraception Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant.:The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant.
The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for ABTC-1501 study in Rave per request by R.Marasigan. mc 4/13/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient, who is a wom
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient, who is a woman of child bearing potential, agreed to use contraception?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Detailed Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is a woman of childbearing potential, has the patient agreed to use two methods of contraception (hormonal or barrier method of birth control; abstinence) prior to study entry, for the duration of study treatment, and through at least 23 weeks after the last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1302
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is a woman of child-bearing potential, has the patient agreed to use adequate contraception (hormonal or barrier method of birth control; abstinence) prior to study entry and for the duration of study participation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1802 Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the female patient agreed to use adequate contraception and not donate ova from screening through 30 days after the last dose of drug?

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for ABTC-1501 study in Rave per request by R.Marasigan. mc 4/13/16 03-09-2018 Fix space at end of question text.
